evidence.claim: Quantgene utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
The platform supports FHIR for health data exchange.
Quantgene adheres to HIPAA regulations for its data handling.
The integration architecture includes REST APIs for seamless data interactions.
Quantgene leverages Snowflake for data warehousing solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or EDI use cases found on the company site.
